chapters.title: Chapter 17: The Wheel of a Life
chapters.info: Rhuarc, p. 283 (394)—Tall, broad-shouldered, blue-eyed clan chief of the Taardad Aiel. He has gray streaks in his red hair. He has two wives: Amys, a Wise One, and Lian, roofmistress of Cold Rocks Hold. Rand put him in charge of Cairhien along with Berelain—they have their disagreements, but overall it is working.
